auth.login_subtitle: Sign in with your Google account to start discovering vehicles
auth.agree_terms: By continuing, you agree to our

terms.title: Terms and Conditions of Use
terms.acceptance_text: By downloading, accessing, or using CarMatch ("the Platform"), you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree to any part of these terms, you must not use our services.
terms.liability_intro: CarMatch acts exclusively as a provider of digital intermediation and technology services.
terms.liability_1_title: We are not part of the transaction
terms.liability_1_text: CarMatch does not buy, sell, or own the listed vehicles. Any purchase agreement is strictly between the Buyer and Seller.
terms.liability_2_text: We do not inspect or guarantee the mechanical, legal, or physical condition of any vehicle. Descriptions are provided entirely by users.
terms.liability_3_text: CarMatch is not responsible for disputes, fraud, non-payment, or any damage arising from negotiations or meetings between users.
terms.liability_4_text: Our "Safe Meeting Points" suggestions or AI alerts are informational only and do not guarantee absolute safety. You are solely responsible for your personal safety.
terms.usage_text: You agree to use CarMatch only for lawful purposes. Posting false, misleading content, or stolen vehicles is prohibited. We reserve the right to remove any post violating our community standards without notice.
terms.fees_text: Vehicle listing may be subject to fees according to our current model (e.g., listing credits after the free period). All fees are non-refundable unless stated otherwise.
terms.mapstore_text: Information shown in "Map Store" regarding workshops and businesses is referential. CarMatch does not endorse or guarantee the quality of services provided by third parties listed on the map.
terms.intellectual_text: All CarMatch content, brands, logos, and software are exclusive property of our holders. Users grant CarMatch a license to display their vehicle photos on the platform.
terms.contact_text: If you have questions about these terms, contact us via our official support in the app.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro_text: At CarMatch, we value and respect your privacy. This policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when using our app and web services.
privacy.collect_1_text: Name, email, phone number, and encrypted password.
privacy.collect_2_text: Details of cars you list (brand, model, photos, condition), which become public information.
privacy.collect_3_text: We use your location (GPS) for critical features like "Map Store" (finding nearby businesses) and showing relevant vehicles in your area.
privacy.collect_4_text: We log your "Likes" and "Dislikes" on CarMatch to improve our recommendations via AI.
privacy.use_1: Facilitate buying and selling of vehicles.
privacy.use_2: Provide safety features, such as meeting point suggestions.
privacy.use_4: Prevent fraud via device fingerprint identification.
privacy.share_bold: We do not sell your personal data to third parties.
privacy.share_1: With other users when you decide to contact them or publish a vehicle (your seller profile is public).
privacy.share_2: With legal authorities if required by law.
privacy.security_text: We implement robust security measures to protect your data, including encryption in transit and at rest. However, remember that no system is 100% infallible.
privacy.rights_text: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You can manage most of this data directly from your user profile or contact support for complete account deletion.

messages.welcome_security_message: Hi! For your safety, we recommend checking our Tips and scheduling Safe Meetings üìÖ using the buttons below.
messages.welcome_security_prefix: Hi! For your safety, we recommend checking our

buyer.title: Buyer Tips
buyer.t1: Never send money in advance to 'reserve'.
buyer.t2: Check the car at REPUVE to verify it's not stolen.
buyer.t3: Always meet in busy public places (Malls, Banks).
buyer.t4: Verify that the VIN matches on chassis and papers.
buyer.t5: Don't carry large amounts of cash. Prefer bank transfer.
buyer.t6: If the price is too good to be true, be suspicious.
buyer.t7: Verify that the seller matches the name on the original invoice.
buyer.t8: Ask for a video call first to confirm the vehicle exists and runs.
buyer.t9: Do not share sensitive personal data like your exact address via chat.
buyer.t10: Check that the engine has no oil leaks or strange noises when starting cold.
buyer.t11: Ask if the car has a history of accidents or major repairs.
buyer.t12: Verify that documents have no erasures or alterations.
buyer.t13: If paying by transfer, do it inside a bank branch.
buyer.t14: Check the condition of tires and suspension; these are expensive fixes.
buyer.t15: Be wary of sellers claiming to be in another city asking for 'shipping' deposits.
buyer.t16: Take a professional mechanic to scan the car's computer.

seller.title: Seller Tips
seller.t1: Do not handover the car until payment is verified in your account.
seller.t2: Show the car in safe places, never at your home.
seller.t4: Do not handover original documents until the sale is closed.
seller.t5: Request the buyer's ID before the test drive.
seller.t6: If payment is in cash, verify it at a bank to avoid fake bills.
seller.t7: Do not let the buyer take the car with just a 'transfer photo'; check your balance.
seller.t8: Make a liability letter or sales contract to release yourself from future fines.
seller.t9: Deliver the car in a place with security cameras.
seller.t10: Do not accept payments in 'installments' or cashier's checks you can't cash immediately.
seller.t11: Cancel your insurance immediately after the new owner takes the car.
seller.t12: Keep a copy of the buyer's ID and proof of address.
seller.t13: Ensure the buyer signs for receiving documents and keys.
seller.t14: Be wary of buyers who don't ask technical questions and want to close the deal too fast.
seller.t15: If the buyer comes from another city, agree on an easy-to-access and safe intermediate point.

general.title: General Safety
general.desc: CarMatch only connects users. We do not intervene in payments or shipping. You are primarily responsible for your safety.

safety_mode.confirm_end: Are you sure you want to end the meeting? This will deactivate safety mode.
